name: CoNNecT (itch)
description:
Created for A Game By Its Cover 2015. Inspired by art by Patrick Gordon.

Wander through a city-like maze, searching for an escape.

"[CoNNecT]...gives you all the tools to simultaneously appreciate and be horrified by the city." David Rudin, Kill Screen

If you pay any money ($0.99 or more) then you can also download some Android and iPhone ringtones taken from sound effects in the game.
